name: RiskAssessment
title: RiskAssessment
description: An assessment of the likely outcome(s) for a patient or other subject as well as the likelihood of each outcome.

elements.name: RiskAssessment
elements.description: An assessment of the likely outcome(s) for a patient or other subject as well as the likelihood of each outcome.

elements.name: identifier
elements.description: Business identifier assigned to the risk assessment.

elements.name: basedOn
elements.description: A reference to the request that is fulfilled by this risk assessment.

elements.name: parent
elements.description: A reference to a resource that this risk assessment is part of, such as a Procedure.

elements.name: status
elements.description: The status of the RiskAssessment, using the same statuses as an Observation.

elements.name: method
elements.description: The algorithm, process or mechanism used to evaluate the risk.

elements.name: code
elements.description: The type of the risk assessment performed.

elements.name: subject
elements.description: The patient or group the risk assessment applies to.

elements.name: encounter
elements.description: The encounter where the assessment was performed.

elements.name: occurrenceDateTime
elements.description: The date (and possibly time) the risk assessment was performed.

elements.name: occurrencePeriod
elements.description: The date (and possibly time) the risk assessment was performed.

elements.name: condition
elements.description: For assessments or prognosis specific to a particular condition, indicates the condition being assessed.

elements.name: performer
elements.description: The provider or software application that performed the assessment.

elements.name: reasonCode
elements.description: The reason the risk assessment was performed.

elements.name: reasonReference
elements.description: Resources supporting the reason the risk assessment was performed.

elements.name: basis
elements.description: Indicates the source data considered as part of the assessment (for example, FamilyHistory, Observations, Procedures, Conditions, etc.).

elements.name: prediction
elements.description: Describes the expected outcome of the assessment.

elements.name: mitigation
elements.description: A description of the steps that might be taken to reduce the identified risk(s).

elements.name: note
elements.description: Additional comments about the risk assessment.
